Package org.monome.pages

Interface Summary
Page The Page interface.
 

Class Summary
AbletonClipLauncherPage The Ableton Clip Launcher page.
AbletonClipUpdater The AbletonClipUpdater runs as a thread and constantly queries Ableton for the state of it's clips and tracks.
AbletonOSCListener The AbletonOSCListener object listens for OSC messages from Ableton calls the Configuration object when messages are received to update any Ableton Clip Launcher pages.
AbletonOSCSettingsFrame The AbletonOSCSettingsFrame class creates a window for accepting Ableton OSC configuration parameters and updates the Configuration object as needed.
Configuration This object stores all configuration about all current monomes and pages.
ExternalApplicationPage The External Application page.
GUI The main Pages GUI and all associated actions.
MachineDrum A utility class to interact with the Elektron MachineDrum over a MIDI connection.
MachineDrumInterfacePage The Machine Drum Interface page.
Main The application entry point
MIDIFader A thread that behaves like a MIDI fader being moved up or down.
MIDIFadersPage The MIDI Faders page.
MIDIKeyboardPage The MIDI Faders page.
MIDISequencerPage The MIDI Faders page.
MIDITriggersPage The MIDI Triggers page.
MonomeConfiguration  
MonomeOSCListener Listens for /press messages from all monomes.
NewMonomeFrame This class generates a configuration window for a new monome configuration.
OSCSettingsFrame The MonomeSerial OSC settings window.
PageTemplate The Template page, a good starting point for creating your own pages.
